name: Candy Snake Master
description: Maybe the most addictive snake game ever. Help baby snake eat candies and become more stronger, all mystery power-ups are your best friends, they can help you and give you more power to fight against those aggressive snakes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2 Ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 5450 or better; 512 MB or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 11 compatible sound card and drivers
